com.glyart.mystral.datasource

Class DataSourceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glyart.mystral.datasource.DataSourceUtils

  • public final class DataSourceUtils
extends Object
    Utility class that deals with DataSources and its related objects.

    • Method Detail

      • newDataSource

        @NotNull
public static @NotNull DataSource newDataSource(@NotNull
                                                          @NotNull Credentials credentials)
                                                   throws DataSourceInitException
        Creates a new DataSource with the given Credentials. This is done by using the default implementation of DataSourceFactory: HikariFactory
        Parameters:
        credentials - the credentials
        Returns:
        a new DataSource
        Throws:
        DataSourceInitException - if something went wrong during the creation of the DataSource
        See Also:
        DataSourceFactory, HikariFactory

      • getConnection

public static @Nullable Connection getConnection(@NotNull

        Simply gets a connection from a given valid DataSource.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - the datasource
        Returns:
        a new connection

      • closePool

        public static void closePool(@Nullable
                             @Nullable DataSource dataSource)
        Closes a connection pool managed by a DataSource.

        NOTE: the provided DataSource must implement the interface Closeable

        Parameters:
        dataSource - the DataSource
        See Also:
        Closeable
